text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly mentions arbitration as a dispute resolution mechanism and provides the reason that 'Arbitral awards are more easily enforced internationally under the New York Convention,' which directly addresses the criterion's requirement that arbitration could decrease the time and money it takes to settle disputes vs. court (enforceability being a key factor in the overall cost/time of dispute resolution).", "criterion_id": "266127e4-faab-4205-8572-cfa4791e5fbd"}
